https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5cOK1suPjx7lKXS6F3vjBQnvXkr.jpg Bella and Jamie. Best friends Bella and Jamie become even closer when Bella's mother and Jamie's father are set to marry each other. Their friendship is tested, however, when Bella finds out Jamie is in a relationship with her ex-boyfriend. Bella & Jamie
